div.head: Description of changes for 2012.12
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft constructed from a copy of the descriptive transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. A transcription of the Sorbonne text still needs to be completed. Corrections and additions await a collation comparison of available manuscript witnesses. Citations, cross-references, and a critical apparatus still need to be constructed. Difficult transcription spots needing attention have been tagged as "unlcear".
